messages.content: You are a creative character designer. Always respond with valid JSON only.

Create a detailed anime character with the following JSON structure: {"name": "character name", "style": "anime", "hairColor": "color", "eyeColor": "color", "personality": ["trait1", "trait2", "trait3"], "backstory": "detailed background story", "specialAbilities": ["ability1", "ability2"], "metadata": {"generatedBy": "openai-gpt", "prompt": "user input here"}}. Make it unique and interesting. The character should be a magical academy student.
